definition: the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
surname Fang
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 尽管来日方长，但是及早打算总没错。

sentences.english: There's still time, the sun just single phosphor.
sentences.chinese: 来日方长，太阳只是颗启明星。

sentences.english: Happiness comes to those who truly deserve it…
sentences.chinese: 的确，真正的幸福，来日方长。

sentences.english: Youth is short if not, who wanted to come to Japan long.
sentences.chinese: 若非青春苦短，谁会想来日方长。

sentences.english: Levi could have a long political career ahead of her.
sentences.chinese: 利瓦伊的政治生涯来日方长。

definition: future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
see 天下沒有不散的筵席|天下没有不散的筵席[tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2]
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan4 xi2

definition: I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
you and I/everyone/all of us (in society)/we (people in general)
all good things must come to an end (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2

definition: take your time/take it easy
goodbye/see you again later
